page.title: 13ACTIVITIES - CHURCH HALL (2)
page.content: The{Playgroup}is open every morning during term time for between 12 and 16 children, who come from several communities. There are 2 paid Supervisors, and a rota of helping mothers. They raise funds by having 'Nearly New' sales, coffee mornings and a Charity Stall in Andover Market. In July 1985 the children and their mothers went on a visit to Pangbourne, to the Child Beale Wildlife Trust, where the children saw birds and farm animals ,and played in an adventure playground. The{Parochial Church Council}meets 4 times a year, and one of these meetings is an A.G.M. At present there are 20 serving members elected from an Electoral Roll of about 130.They appoint sub-committees to manage various activities e.g.the{Church Hall {sub-committee}.
